column4: obiwan, it restarted but I still have the same problem.  I can hear audio from Audacity but not from Rythmbox or anything else
obiwan, sound is working from hw:0,0     I think the system in general is not using that
then you need help from another guy, i'm know little about it
if nothing worked, try reinstalling alsa . sudo apt-get install --reinstall alsa-utils && sudo apt-get install --reinstall pulseaudio it won't hurt
